Title: Welcome to the Kree Empire
Writer: Caroline Farah, Paul Giacoppo, Jack Kirby (comic book), Mark Parsons, Joe Simon (comic book)
Actors: Eric Loomis, Jim Ward, Fred Tatasciore, Brian Bloom
Plot: Ronan the Accuser of the Kree Empire arrives at Earth with Captain Mar-Vel in tow to pass judgment on whether the planet should be annexed or destroyed.
